response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and achieve substantial growth. Given its immense value to you, I propose a special introductory offer priced at $1,200,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
